Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Tianyi, headquartered in Shenzhen, is a company passionate about design and developing innovative digital products and services. Its partners span Southeast Asia, the Middle East, and Asia.
Founded in 2018, Tianyi specializes in mobile internet software development, enterprise office ERP, and the integration of various complex business processes. Its low-code office system is designed for rapid deployment and deployment of customized enterprise services. Tianyi also designs and develops blockchain technology solutions, including blockchain web wallets, NFT solutions, and blockchain "alliance chain" technology development and integration. The company also provides IDC data center services, CDN acceleration for enterprise products, and professional internet access networking technology, including DDOS and CC attack defense systems, high-bandwidth dedicated internet access and defense services, as well as enterprise SD-WAN acceleration, SD-WAN networking, and cloud dedicated line services.
